WorkItem.Description:
At the healing shamans are Spirit and the talent meditation is not involved with in the assessments / calculations.
Â 
I'm sorry about my English, it is written with the Google translator:)

Comments.Message: The meditation perk is indeed added into the model, what issue are you seeing that is making you think that it is not?

Because the Mp5 values are not correct.

At the Arsenal or even in the game I had a cast regeneration of the 2000. In the program there are only 900.
I have just seen that no cast times or Hps are displayed.
You have the level 80 box unchecked, correct?  I'm working to remove that box to avoid confusion.

Hi. It does not matter whether the box is checked or not, the values are not in both cases.

Furthermore containing no Hps are displayed values.

If you want to try it once with the Char Santor in the program and compare it with the Arsenal.

Char: Santor
Server: The Syndicate
Region: EU
Battlegroup: Raserei / Frenzy
Please check when either a new build is out, or when you are able to if you are able to build the source, I believe the issue should be fixed.
